newsitem.title: USA: StaffMark says buys 2 private staffing cos.
newsitem.headline: StaffMark says buys 2 private staffing cos.

text.p: StaffMark Inc said Wednesday it acquired two privately-held staffing companies, HR Alternatives and TPS/Furr & Associates, for undisclosed terms.
StaffMark, a staffing services provider, said it expected the acquisitions would increase its 1997 earnings per share. It said both deals would be accounted for as asset purchases.

HR Alternatives, headquartered in Kingsport, Tennessee, had revenues in fiscal year 1996 of more than $8.0 million. TPS/Furr & Associates, headquartered in Monroe, North Carolina, had revenues in excess of $4.0 million.
StaffMark also said it has recently increased its line of credit with Mercantile Bank of St. Louis NA from $50 million to $100 million to ensure adequate capital to continue its growth strategies.
